articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Ponting backs Maxwell heroics to inspire Australia to World Cup glory - ICC Women's World Cup
articles.description: Australia great Ricky Ponting believes his former side will obtain great belief from Glenn Maxwell’s stunning innings against Afghanistan and that it could prove pivotal in their quest for a sixth ICC Men's Cricket World Cup title.
articles.content: Australia great Ricky Ponting believes his former side will obtain great belief from Glenn Maxwells stunning innings against Afghanistan and that it could prove pivotal in their quest for a sixth ICC… [+2163 chars]

articles.author: Alex Malcolm
articles.title: Meg Lanning retires from international cricket - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Lanning makes the shock decision to retire at age 31 having missed Australia last three series due to a medical issue
articles.content: NewsLanning makes the shock decision to retire at age 31 having missed Australia last three series due to a medical issue
